keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn(s).

keywords.name: Brass
keywords.description: Increase the damage and Block of the next viable card you play for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

keywords.name: Cargo
keywords.description: Cards in Cargo retain between combats until they are removed.

keywords.name: Chill
keywords.description: Chilled creatures deal less damage this turn.

keywords.name: Clank
keywords.description: Perform an effect unless prevented.

keywords.name: Cold [snowpunk:ColdIcon]
keywords.description: Draw [snowpunk:ColdIcon] cards.

keywords.name: Condensed
keywords.description: This card can be played this turn even if you don't have enough [E] , but if you play it this way, it Exhausts.

keywords.name: Crank
keywords.description: The next card you play with [Snowpunk:GearIcon]  gains [Snowpunk:GearIcon] .

keywords.name: Desperation
keywords.description: If you are at or below 50% of your max HP, or have at least 2 unique Debuffs, this card costs 0.

keywords.name: Dualstrike
keywords.description: If this card is the first one played this turn, play a copy of it.

keywords.name: Duplicate
keywords.description: Add a copy of this card to the discard pile.

keywords.name: Evaporate
keywords.description: Shuffle a card into the Evaporate pile.

keywords.name: Evaporated
keywords.description: Any cards in the Evaporate pile are Evaporated.

keywords.name: Fireball [snowpunk:FireIcon]
keywords.description: The next card you play becomes Hot.

keywords.name: Frigid
keywords.description: Frigid creatures take more damage from Attacks equal to their Chill.

keywords.name: Fuse
keywords.description: Remove a card from combat. The card it is fused to plays a copy of it for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Gears [snowpunk:GearIcon]
keywords.description: Increase a card's [snowpunk:GearIcon] effects.

keywords.name: Hat
keywords.description: This card is free to play, but then loses a Hat.

keywords.name: Heavy
keywords.description: Whenever this card is reshuffled, move it to the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Holly [snowpunk:HollyIcon]
keywords.description: If you have 12 or more Holly, your next Attack or Skill plays twice and then you lose 12 Holly.

keywords.name: Hook
keywords.description: If you have more Block than the target's HP, remove them from combat.

keywords.name: Hot [snowpunk:HotIcon]
keywords.description: Shuffle into the Evaporate pile. When drawn from the Evaporate pile reduce Hot by 1.

keywords.name: Modifications
keywords.description: Modifications include Hot, Cold, [Snowpunk:GearIcon] , Plating, and Hats!

keywords.name: Overclock
keywords.description: Increase modifiable effects on the card by 25% per stack.

keywords.name: Overdrive [snowpunk:OverIcon]
keywords.description: Play an additional time for each Overdrive.

keywords.name: Plating [Snowpunk:PlateIcon]
keywords.description: Increase the damage and Block of a card.

keywords.name: Snowball [snowpunk:SnowIcon]
keywords.description:
Counts as [E].
Spent after [E].
Conserved between turns.
